title: Assessment and spatialization of vulnerability of Benin coast to sea level rise using composite/blended approach
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 157

Author(s): Sèna Donalde Dolorès Marguerite Déguénon, O.N. Fabrice Baguere, Oscar Teka, Denis Worlanyo Aheto, Brice Sinsin
